case.read: Panuihia nga waahanga katoa e tohuhia ana i te waahi
case.write: Tuhia nga waahi katoa e tohuhia ana ki te waahi

convos.read_all: Tirohia te ahua o nga korero o naianei.
convos.manage_own: Hono me te whakakore i te convo.
convos.moderate_others: Tīmatahia te convo, mutu te convo, ka tango i te kaiuru.
convos.read_all_submissions: Panuihia nga korerorero katoa kua tuhia.

events.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te muku i a koe ake kaupapa.
events.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te takahanga a etahi atu.
events.submit_own: Whakapumautia te tono tae atu ki nga huihuinga.

posts.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te whakakore i a koe ake pou.
posts.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te whakairinga a etahi atu.

forms.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te muku i to ake ahua.
forms.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te ahua o etahi atu.

invoices.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te muku i a koe ake nama.
invoices.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te nama a etahi atu.

notes.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te muku i a koe ake tuhipoka.
notes.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te tuhipoka a etahi atu.

signs.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te whakakore i a koe ake tohu-e.
signs.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te tohu-e a etahi atu.

tasks.manage_own: Waihanga, whakahou me te muku i a koe ake mahi.
tasks.moderate_others: Whakahou me te muku i te mahi a etahi atu.

team.read_all: Pānuihia te kapa i roto i te take
